verses.name: Lamentations 3:58
verses.text: O Lord, thou hast pleaded the causes of my soul; thou hast redeemed my life.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:59
verses.text: O Lord, thou hast seen my wrong: judge thou my cause.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:60
verses.text: Thou hast seen all their vengeance and all their imaginations against me.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:61
verses.text: Thou hast heard their reproach, O Lord, and all their imaginations against me;

verses.name: Lamentations 3:62
verses.text: The lips of those that rose up against me, and their device against me all the day.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:63
verses.text: Behold their sitting down, and their rising up; I am their musick.

verses.name: Lamentations 3:64
verses.text: Render unto them a recompence, O Lord, according to the work of their hands.
